assessment_item.subject: Microbiology
assessment_item.title: 7VIN35Q7 கீழ்கண்டவற்றில் எது இயற்கை தடுப்பாற்றல் முறைக்கு பொருந்தாதது?
assessment_item.body:
{"data":{"plugin":{"id":"org.ekstep.questionunit.mcq","version":"1.1","templateId":"horizontalMCQ"},"data":{"question":{"text":"

கீழ்கண்டவற்றில் எது இயற்கை தடுப்பாற்றல் முறைக்கு பொருந்தாதது?

 

","image":"","audio":"","audioName":"","hint":""},"options":[{"text":"

நினைவு பகுதி

","image":"","audio":"","audioName":"","hint":"","isCorrect":true,"$$hashKey":"object:1234"},{"text":"

தனித்தன்மை இல்லாமை

","image":"","audio":"","audioName":"","hint":"","isCorrect":false,"$$hashKey":"object:1235"},{"text":"

பல்வகை செல் வகைகளின் ஈடுபாடு

","image":"","audio":"","audioName":"","isCorrect":false,"$$hashKey":"object:1245"},{"text":"

தூண்டலின் மூலம் செயல்பாடு

","image":"","audio":"","audioName":"","isCorrect":false,"$$hashKey":"object:1250"}],"questionCount":0,"media":[]},"config":{"metadata":{"max_score":1,"isShuffleOption":true,"isPartialScore":true,"templateType":"Horizontal","name":"7VIN35Q7 கீழ்கண்டவற்றில் எது இயற்கை தடுப்பாற்றல் முறைக்கு பொருந்தாதது?","title":"7VIN35Q7 கீழ்கண்டவற்றில் எது இயற்கை தடுப்பாற்றல் முறைக்கு பொருந்தாதது?","board":"State (Tamil Nadu)","medium":"Tamil","gradeLevel":["Class 11"],"subject":"Microbiology","qlevel":"MEDIUM","category":"MCQ"},"max_time":0,"max_score":1,"partial_scoring":true,"layout":"Horizontal","isShuffleOption":true,"questionCount":1},"media":[]}}
